#include<cstdio>
#include<cstring>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cctype>
#include<cmath>
#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<cassert>

using namespace std;

#define S(t); scanf("%d", &t);
#define SL(t); scanf("%lld",&t);
#define SU(t); scanf("%llu", &t);
#define SS(t); scanf("%s",t);
#define P(t); printf("%d\n",t);
#define PL(t); printf("%lld\n",t);
#define PU(t); printf("%llu\n",t);

#define REP(i,n) for(i=0; i<n; i++)
#define MAXN 1010
#define MOD 1000000007

//4:00

typedef long long int llint;

int main()
{
     int i, j, t, n, c, f,y;
     llint p;
     
     S(t);
     while(t--)
     {
          SL(p);
          S(y);
          
          for(i=2000; i<y; i++)
          {
               p *= p;
               if(p>MOD)
               {
                   p %= MOD;
               }
          }
          PL(p);
     }
     return 0;
}
